dom.js - Fis3 Code

Functions defined

  • dom

Source code

  1. 'use strict';

  3. ‌function dom (options) {
  4.   var o = options || {};
  5.   if (!o.type) { o.type = 'div'; }
  6.   var elem = document.createElement(o.type);
  7.   if (o.className) { elem.className = o.className; }
  8.   if (o.text) { elem.innerText = elem.textContent = o.text; }
  9.   if (o.attributes) {
  10.     Object.keys(o.attributes).forEach(function(key) {
  11.       elem.setAttribute(key, o.attributes[key]);
  12.     });
  13.   }
  14.   if (o.parent) { o.parent.appendChild(elem); }
  15.   return elem;
  16. }

  18. module.exports = dom;
